extends java.lang.Object

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Call when the program is starting. Initalize some variables like groups, students, logger, reader and SQL connection.
        Parameters:
        args - The program arguments.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If files couldn't be read.
        java.lang.SecurityException - If the database connection can't be made.
        See Also:
        FileHandler.FileHandler(String, boolean)
